full_sentence: Thanks for the post - and this is me being a grammar Nazi-- not to be a dickhead, but because I'd like to understand your future comments when I see them without sitting too long looking at them. *Omit those full stops where necessary, if you would.
If you are a hermie there is no way you are normal

I've known this happen with many women I was interested in until I found out that they were only why me because I'm black. One lied to me about how many kids she had, and their ages, and race. Someone was kind enough to tell me don't you know 'so and so has a couple of mixed kids?' I'll just add their # to the block list, and be done with it. They don't deserve a man like me. They should go back and not fetishize me.

i must also be race blind since I dont see different races. oh, its because they dont exsist as we are all born as humans.
